mapper.select: SELECT RSA.RESERVATION_CODE , STAY_START_DATE , STAY_END_DATE , DAY_USE , RESERVATION_STATE_CODE , REFUND , SUB_ACCOM_CODE FROM RESERVATION_STAY_ACCOM RSA, RESERVATION_STATE RS WHERE SUB_ACCOM_CODE = #{subAccomCode} AND RSA.RESERVATION_CODE=RS.RESERVATION_CODE

SELECT RSA.RESERVATION_CODE , STAY_START_DATE , STAY_END_DATE , RESERVATION_DATE , RESERVATION_NAME , RSA.RESERVATION_PRICE , DAY_USE , RESERVATION_STATE_CODE , REFUND , REVIEW , REFUND_PRICE , REFUND_DATE , CAN_REFUND_DATE , OVER_DATE , ACCOM_NAME , MS.ACCOM_CODE , RSA.SUB_ACCOM_CODE FROM RESERVATION_STAY_ACCOM RSA, RESERVATION_STATE RS, MAIN_ACCOM MS, SUB_ACCOM SA WHERE RSA.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND RSA.RESERVATION_CODE=RS.RESERVATION_CODE AND RSA.SUB_ACCOM_CODE=SA.SUB_ACCOM_CODE AND MS.ACCOM_CODE =SA.ACCOM_CODE ORDER BY RESERVATION_DATE DESC

SELECT BASKET_CODE , ba.SUB_ACCOM_CODE , MEMBER_ID , STAY_START_DATE , STAY_END_DATE , STAY_TERM , DAY_USE , SUB_ACCOM_NAME , ACCOM_NAME , RESERVATION_PRICE , DAYUSE_PRICE , RENT_TIME FROM BASKET_STAY_ACCOM ba ,SUB_ACCOM su ,MAIN_ACCOM ma WHERE ba.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ba.SUB_ACCOM_CODE =su.SUB_ACCOM_CODE AND su.ACCOM_CODE= ma.ACCOM_CODE

INSERT INTO RESERVATION_STAY_ACCOM( RESERVATION_CODE, SUB_ACCOM_CODE, MEMBER_ID, STAY_START_DATE, STAY_END_DATE, RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_NAME, DAY_USE) SELECT
#{reservUuid} AS RESERVATION_CODE , BAS.SUB_ACCOM_CODE , MEMBER_ID , STAY_START_DATE , STAY_END_DATE
, (STAY_TERM*RESERVATION_PRICE) AS RESERVATION_PRICE , SUB_ACCOM_NAME||' 숙박 '||TO_CHAR(STAY_TERM)|| '박' || TO_CHAR(STAY_TERM+1) || '일'
, (STAY_TERM*DAYUSE_PRICE) AS RESERVATION_PRICE , SUB_ACCOM_NAME || ' 대실 ' || TO_CHAR(STAY_TERM*RENT_TIME) || '시간'
, DAY_USE FROM BASKET_STAY_ACCOM BAS, SUB_ACCOM SUB WHERE BASKET_CODE = #{basketCode} AND BAS.SUB_ACCOM_CODE=SUB.SUB_ACCOM_CODE

INSERT INTO RESERVATION_STATE(RESERVATION_STATE_CODE , RESERVATION_CODE , CAN_REFUND_DATE , OVER_DATE) VALUES ((SELECT 'STATE_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(RESERVATION_STATE_CODE,7))),0)+1,3,'0')FROM RESERVATION_STATE)
,#{reservationCode} ,TO_DATE(#{canRefundDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#{overDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT RE.REVIEW_CODE , ACCOM_CODE ,(SELECT ACCOM_NAME FROM MAIN_ACCOM WHERE MAIN_ACCOM.ACCOM_CODE= RE.ACCOM_CODE) AS ACCOM_NAME , MEMBER_ID , SCORE , CONTENT , WRITE_DATE , REVIEW_IMG_CODE , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME ,(SELECT ADMIN_MEMBER_ID FROM REVIEW_ADMIN WHERE REVIEW_ADMIN.REVIEW_CODE= RE.REVIEW_CODE) AS ADMIN_MEMBER_ID ,(SELECT ADMIN_CONTENT FROM REVIEW_ADMIN WHERE REVIEW_ADMIN.REVIEW_CODE= RE.REVIEW_CODE) AS ADMIN_CONTENT ,(SELECT ADMIN_WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW_ADMIN WHERE REVIEW_ADMIN.REVIEW_CODE= RE.REVIEW_CODE) AS ADMIN_WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW RE , REVIEW_IMG REIMG WHERE ACCOM_CODE = #{accomCode} AND RE.REVIEW_CODE = REIMG.REVIEW_CODE ORDER BY WRITE_DATE

SELECT RE.REVIEW_CODE , ACCOM_CODE , RESERVATION_CODE ,(SELECT ACCOM_NAME FROM MAIN_ACCOM WHERE MAIN_ACCOM.ACCOM_CODE= RE.ACCOM_CODE) AS ACCOM_NAME , RE.MEMBER_ID , SCORE , CONTENT , WRITE_DATE , REVIEW_IMG_CODE , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME ,(SELECT ADMIN_MEMBER_ID FROM REVIEW_ADMIN WHERE REVIEW_ADMIN.REVIEW_CODE= RE.REVIEW_CODE) AS ADMIN_MEMBER_ID ,(SELECT ADMIN_CONTENT FROM REVIEW_ADMIN WHERE REVIEW_ADMIN.REVIEW_CODE= RE.REVIEW_CODE) AS ADMIN_CONTENT ,(SELECT ADMIN_WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW_ADMIN WHERE REVIEW_ADMIN.REVIEW_CODE= RE.REVIEW_CODE) AS ADMIN_WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW RE , REVIEW_IMG REIMG WHERE MEMBER_ID= #{memberId} AND RE.REVIEW_CODE = REIMG.REVIEW_CODE ORDER BY WRITE_DATE
